us.pserver.cdr.crypt

Class CryptStringCoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.cdr.crypt.CryptStringCoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Coder<java.lang.String>, CryptCoder<java.lang.String>

    public class CryptStringCoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements CryptCoder<java.lang.String>
    Codificador/Decodificador de criptografia para String's.
